products.title: Deanna Mist - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna mist is a very modern take on a standard white blind. With a gentle hint of silver and the two-tone effect created by the raised deanna patterning, this blind offers a pretty and classy shimmer. The mist is the perfect addition to any contemporary room and will contrast well with crisp, clean colours and tones, setting off against rich greys particularly well. Use in a bedroom for a bright and airy feel, or in a bathroom to keep the atmosphere fresh and clean.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Steel - Roller Blind
products.description: The light, pastel shade of the origin (blackout) in steel adds a perfectly neutral accent to any window. Its cutting edge blackout properties mean that it will keep out even the brightest rays from the sun, yet you won't be compromising on style. The steel contrasts wonderfully with its sister browns and beiges, yet also tempers bolder colours such as burgundy or emerald when needed. Use to complement contemporary patterns in the kitchen or bold blues or greens in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to add a subtle stone grey to the mix that has a hint of urban chic, origin stone is the fabric that makes it possible. It's more than just a unique touch of style, and thanks to the blackout fabric it allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. The perfect marriage of style and functionality. Taking your time is the way to create spaces you love, so why not give your new project some extra thought? Lightly sanded floors, magnolia walls, and striking wall art to finish everything off.

products.title: Origin City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: City grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home. The steely character of the grey is softened by the sleek finishing and smooth surfaces of the wooden slats to create a homely addition that will enhance any space. Origin, city grey - venetian blind city grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home.

products.title: Origin Pewter - Day Night Blind
products.description: The fabric of the slate grey origin pewter is sleek and modern, allowing for a clean and streamlined look and easy workability. The controls and brackets are tucked neatly into the overhead rail cassette, affording the blind extra tidiness and attractiveness. Place the pewter against pure white walls in the living room and add matching grey throws and cushions throughout the room. Choose a bright shade, such as zesty lime, funky satsuma, or cobalt blue, to add bursts of colour throughout the room.

products.title: Origin Taupe Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: In a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to allow more or less light into the room. Create an industrial look in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the taupe grey amidst cobalt blue or slate grey walls, perhaps including a brick-look wallpaper for a fun effect.

products.title: Origin Medium Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: A contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the room whilst still retaining privacy. Use the medium grey as part of a strong, moody dcor scheme in an older child's bedroom, framing it with stark white or pale grey walls. Add distinctive metallic furniture, in materials such as steel and wire, to add a real sense of style to the room.

products.title: Origin Cosmopolitan Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmopolitan grey from the origin range is a light contemporary tone that allows you to add a depth of colour to any space without sacrificing your light and airy look and feel. The finely crafted slats work in perfect harmony with the subtle stylings of this unique tone to create a visual that will live long in the memory. Origin, cosmopolitan grey - venetian blind cosmopolitan grey from the origin range is a light contemporary tone that allows you to add a depth of colour to any space without sacrificing your light and airy look and feel.

products.title: Origin Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey is a powerful and eye-catching tone that will inject a presence into any room or space. The earthy quality of the colour is matched beautifully by the minimalist finishing of the slats to create a simple yet striking visual that captures the eye the moment you enter. Origin, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey is a powerful and eye-catching tone that will inject a presence into any room or space.

products.title: Burlington Shadow - Vertical Blind
products.description: In a soft dove grey, the burlington shadow offers subtle style, with its solid, strong fabric and pretty abstract patterning. The vertical sheets hang neatly, able to be pulled across or tilted according to your light and privacy needs. Use the shadow as part of a grey and white colour scheme, which gives understated style and a fresh, airy look, perfect for a guest bedroom or home office. Go for clean, contemporary furniture to keep the feel modern and welcoming.

products.title: Grande Shadow - Vertical Blind
products.description: Fashion an elegant dcor scheme with the grande shadow, where exquisite silky threads merge to parade a creative and captivating display of textured waves. This attractive blind also flaunts a calming, seafoam hue with a contemporary grey tinge. It is perfectly suited to many surroundings, and furthermore, contains adjustable slats to allow the desired amount of ventilation and privacy. Create a sophisticated dining area by matching the shadow with a soothing colour palette of whites, olives, and avocados.

products.title: Affinity Silver - Vertical Blind
products.description: Affinity's silver combines a shimmering fabric background with raised, pretty patterning to craft a pretty yet unobtrusive filter blind. A robust vertical blind, the neatly hanging louvres will work effortlessly open and close on demand. The silver can sit as a soft window feature against white walls and light woods to create a modern take on traditional styling in a living room or bedroom. Or use it with dark greys and silver accessories for a cool, one-of-a-kind look in your bathroom or hallway.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Pewter - Vertical Blind
products.description: In soft slate grey, the roma (fr) in pewter is a versatile neutral that can be used to match a wide range of decor styles. The flawless fabric is flame-retardant, making it an ideal choice for a commercial property, and hangs in orderly louvres for a tidy and streamlined aesthetic. Tame pillar-box reds, jet blacks, and stark whites by adding the softness of the pewter to the mix. Stick to white walls to maintain a feeling of light and space, and use block colour items for clean lines and hard edges, forming a highly contemporary look.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout) Slate - Vertical Blind
products.description: The sarra (blackout) in slate unites a sophisticated light texturing with a utilitarian slate grey to craft a stylish blackout blind that wins in both practicality and versatility. When closed, this blind will keep sunlight, street lights, and car lights well and truly out, so that you can be totally interrupted. If you can't resist a monochromatic colour scheme, then the slate could be for you. Use it in the kitchen as part of an industrial look, set against blacks and whites, or let this be a central feature in a teenager's bedroom for a versatile window covering that will match most colours.

products.title: Cotswold Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in even the most modern home. Adding smaller features to the living room like a side lamp and coasters in pebble grey is a great way to create a subtle secondary layer to your decor. Keep the main colours to rich creams and lightly coloured woods and you'll see your favourite new colour really come to the fore.

products.title: Splash (Blackout) Code - Vertical Blind
products.description: Glistening patterning on a pale beige background takes centre stage on the splash (blackout) blind in code, whilst its adjustable louvres and wipe-clean surface add functionality and common sense, making for the perfect mixture of head and heart. For a clean and relaxing look in your home office, group with cappuccino browns and heavy creams, to provide luxury and elegance without going over the top.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Light Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: A soft dove grey forms the basis for the palermo (blackout) light grey, gently accented by the light-reflecting, gentle texturing. For a blind that will go with almost any dcor and will last year upon year, this could be the option for you. Team the light grey with bold reds or forest greens that need tempering by a more neutral shade, forming a gorgeous colour combination in a bedroom or den. Grey can still be cosy, so don't be fooled by its cool demeanour; paired with the right colours, this blind can help you to create a warm and welcoming home.

products.title: Cotswold Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

products.title: Deanna Mist - Vertical Blind
products.description: The tempered neutrality of the deanna mist brings a cool, traditional feel to whichever window it's used in. This off-white blind is made from a long-lasting, quality fabric that hangs neatly as easily manoeuvrable louvres that you can adjust according to your light and privacy needs. The mist will add a cool look to warmer, bolder colours, such as burgundy in the dining room, plum in the living room, or chocolate in the kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Graphite - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in graphite gives a fantastically contemporary effect that is so versatile that it can be paired with almost any colour scheme. Made from high quality, lightweight fabric that is durable and long-lasting, this is a functional option as well as a chic one. Accent with silvers and whites for a modern living room; team with a bold red to make a statement in the dining room; or create a feature window in a white or cream hallway.

products.title: Deanna Cool Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sweet and subtle, the deanna in cool grey is a pleasure to behold, with its soft, silvery hue and gently curved patterning, which adds a little depth to an otherwise simple blind. Paired with the right colour scheme and dcor choices, this filter blind can look simply stunning in your home. Team the cool grey with blacks and whites to maintain a contemporary, monochrome colour scheme, offset by hints of silver in the form of ornaments and frames.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Steel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The smooth neutral of the origin (blackout) steel is a versatile shade of grey-beige that works well with almost any colour it comes across. The quality blackout fabric works well as adjustable louvres, which can be moved according to how much light you want in your room. Complement a rich burgundy for a traditional colour scheme in the lounge or den, or pair with browns and taupes for a cosy, modern feel in the kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Taupe - Vertical Blind
products.description: A dark taupe in colour, the appropriately named origin (blackout) taupe is a wonderfully tactile, cotton-feel fabric that you'll find you just love to touch. Regardless of its forgiving feel, the high quality fabric is hardwearing and resilient, effortlessly serving its purpose as a proficient blackout blind. For warm, welcoming atmosphere, place the taupe against your kitchen window, surrounded by soft creams and the occasional darker brown.

products.title: Faux Silk Silver - Roman Blind
products.description: It doesn't get more glamorous than the faux silk silver, with its ebony shading and satin-smooth fabric. Raised stitching flecks the cloth, adding texture and flair to this sophisticated roman blind. The silver will hang almost anywhere in the home, whether amongst white walls with mid-grey and silver highlights for a monochromatic scheme in the dining room, with zesty citrus shades for a bright and energising look in the kitchen, or amid pale pastels to add a modern but calming touch to a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Blackout Roller Light Grey (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Capella Carbon Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The wonderful thing about carbon silver is that it manages to combine the charm and sophistication of two metallic finishes in perfect harmony. The silver shines under the light, and the carbon provides balance and stability that allows you to transition between more luxurious pieces as you move around the room. Use carbon silver in the dining room where it can partner your new glass dining table with chrome frame.

products.title: Anthology Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: The natural weave of the anthology in moonstone gives you the best of it all; the benefits of a high quality dim-out blind, plus a light, outdoorsy feel. The grainy, woven fabric provides a blind that's built to last. Beige will match almost any dcor scheme, but the moonstone will look especially stylish in a contemporary country dining room, surrounded by deep browns and soft creams, or set against bolder reds in a cosy bedroom, where you can curl up and relax.

products.title: Kindling Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and with a refined combination of regal colour on show it can add anything you want to your decor too. The silver makes the perfect companion to coppers and golds. Use them as the finishing touches rather than the primary colours so that you don't overwhelm your interior.

products.title: Dune Aztec Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Dune aztec stone is a fabric that we're proud to call their own, and it's easy to see why when you take a closer look at it. The minimalist design works in perfect harmony with the neutral base colour and relaxing shades of brown. Just what you need to soften the ambience in any room. If you want to create a look that instantly makes you feel at home then the bedroom is the ideal place for aztec stone.

products.title: Capella Silver Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the contrast between the delicate silver thread of silver blush and the soft pink foundation fabric. It has that cute and cosy feel that all decor should, and yet it's the luxurious choice of pattern that really shines through and catches the eye. When you have your heart set on putting your own stamp on things it can be frustrating looking for your perfect match. We created silver blush for those of you looking to blend homeliness, luxury, and a little hint of country style.

products.title: Cotswold Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats. Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories.

products.title: Origin Deluxe City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor. The depth and striking finish of the steely grey work in perfect harmony with the gently crafted wooden slats and the assortment of unique complimentary fixtures and features. Origin deluxe, city grey - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor.

products.title: Origin Deluxe Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing. By bringing the two together in perfect harmony, and adding a selection of easy on the eye fixtures, it creates a striking visual that will set the tone for the rest of your decor. Origin deluxe, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing.

products.title: Origin Deluxe Cosmopolitan Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason. With a unique tone that allows you to create a homely and relaxing atmosphere in any room, it brings with it a sense of balance and poise that will allow you to add new depth and character to your decor in an instant. Origin deluxe, cosmopolitan grey - venetian blind cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love the look of cotswold pebble grey why not take a closer look at their deluxe option? By offering you something you won't see everyday it allows you to take your decor in a new direction by opening your eyes to what is possible when you fuse design and functionality in perfect harmony. Turning the living room into your own little oasis away from it all is about setting the tone when it comes to colours.

products.title: Crosshatch Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: Crosshatch silver combines a classic geometric pattern with a striking silver that is sure to make a little noise. It's a pattern that seems to reverse depending on the angle of the light, and one which is finished with aplomb by the slightly blueish quality of the silver threads. Combining silver with a dark charcoal is a great way to emphasise the elegance of the shimmer. It's all about giving the threads the platform they need to speak for themselves, so don't be shy about organising your room with this purpose in mind.

products.title: Karma Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: If you are looking for a dark and moody colour that still adds some light and sparkle to your home, karma taupe could be just what you need. The background glistens and shimmers, making any space feel alive and energetic. And at the same time the matt finish of the trees give it a slightly sombre and tempered feel. A truly thought-provoking contrast. Take your time with taupe, and look to add matching patterns to your wallpaper and scatter cushions.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout) Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: Moonstone from their anthology (blackout) range allows you to introduce a blend of white, beige, and grey to your colour scheme with the click of a button. Its intricate weave and clever patched style of colouring provides a depth and subtlety to proceedings that you perhaps weren't expecting. Take your decor down the contemporary meets country route by adding in some stencil signs on the walls, shabby chic furniture, and a little cracked leather for good measure.

products.title: Kalmar Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you add kalmar slate to your home you get to sit back and enjoy a subtle design that offers you different looks and shades as the light level in your space changes. With a broad spectrum of on-trend greys each vying for your attention you'll have nothing else to do but sit back and enjoy the visual. Combining slate with a couple of complimentary dark accessories in an otherwise light and breezy room is the way to get the most out of it.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love the luxury look and feel of cotswold silverton grey then why not take a look at their deluxe option complete with exquisite fabric ribbons? With a unique look that you won't find anywhere else you'll be able to dress your home to impress like never before. We love the look and feel of pairing silverton grey with a mixture of whites, creams, and light greys in the guest bedroom. That way you can create a clean and crisp look that your guests will never want to leave.

products.title: Anthology Moonstone - Vertical Blind
products.description: The purposeful style of the anthology in moonstone provides the best of both worlds with its gorgeous, woven texture and natural beige hue. The light, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and hangs in neat louvres for easy workability. The traditional room for such a natural material might be the kitchen, where it will undeniably look fantastic amongst hessian fabrics and woven wicker, but why not couple the moonstone with deep chocolate browns in a country living room instead? With this versatile fabric, you'll never run out of options.

products.title: Morning Mist Spring - Roller Blind
products.description: The morning mist spring is one of their most beautiful and finely crafted blinds. Made from a fine quality, lightweight fabric, spring is printed with a truly stunning range of life-drawn, blossoming wildflowers. Sure to add a sense of artistry that relaxes and entertains in equal measure, the natural colouring and designs of the spring make it an ideal addition to a country-themed kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Morning Mist Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: Morning mist autumn is a beautifully crafted filter blind made from the finest lightweight fabric. Printed with a quite wonderful autumn-scape of wildflowers, this blind is sure to add a touch of artistry to whichever room in the house you choose to hang it. A perfect way to add some beauty to a room, the autumn would look striking in a living room or dining room, where you can show it off to friends and family as you relax in the evening.

products.title: Etching Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: Etching pewter combines a contemporary geometric print with a more traditional textured look that gives your new roller blinds added depth and clarity. The way in which the light greys ebb and flow is sure to set your mind at ease, and leave you with plenty of time to consider how to elevate your decor further. Matching to pewter is all about being subtle with your colours, and clever with your use of space.

products.title: Garden City Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on a life of their own, unconstrained by thick outlines or crisp edges. When you want to create a theme that instantly sets your mind at ease there's no better way to do it than to embrace other urban finishes.

products.title: Ashanti Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti haze is a high quality fabric combined with an effortlessly stylish, contemporary design. The stripes come in various widths, and features lilac, dark purple, fashionable charcoal, and timeless off-white. The way the lilac and dark purple play off one another will add style and character to your home. Why not use the ashanti haze in your bedroom to match your bed linen? Or perhaps use it in the kitchen, where it's uplifting tones are sure to catch the eye.

products.title: Ashanti Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti crimson combines a top quality fabric with a modern, feel-good design, and alternating strip widths give this filter blind a clean, contemporary feel, whilst the crimson highlighting looks fantastic when contrasted against the black and light browns. Use the light brown backdrop of the crimson to match light and dark woods, as well as country-themed areas in the house. Then let the crimson stripes stand out on their own, and provide your room with a little dash of colour.

products.title: Abstract Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Abstract stone gets its name from the texture that inspired it, and it's easy to see why. The timeless quality of stone is something that endures and inspires in equal measure, so what better basis for a great addition to your interiors? As the colours drift into one another you are left to ponder precisely how the delicate balance was struck. Matching to the abstract range is all about going in search of complimentary textures.

products.title: Visage Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you need when you want to create a space you never want to leave. Allow yourself to be inspired, and add plenty of matching light woody beiges to the mixing pot. This is their advice to you if you want to be able to reframe your living room and bedroom.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade.
